com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.response

Interface DataResponse

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataResponseImpl

    public interface DataResponse
    The DataResponse interface is a response to a data request.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte FAIL_DUPLICATE
      The data request failed because the record was a duplicate of an existing record.
      static byte FAIL_GENERAL
      The data request failed for a non-specific reason.
      static byte FAIL_LOCKED
      The data request failed because the record was locked.
      static byte SUCCESS
      The data request was a success.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAttribute(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Add an attribute to the data response.
      java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.String attributeKey)
      Get the attribute for the key.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAttributes()
      Get the attributes for the response.
      byte getStatus()
      Get the status of the request.

        boolean addAttribute(java.lang.String key,

        Add an attribute to the data response.
        Parameters:
